entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Attawapiskat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:35 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -27.1°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 29.
